trans-unit.resname: RNA·30 | Watchful Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个1/1白色人类衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·30 | Watchful Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Loitering is not only illegal but unwise, since those who stay too long in one place are apt to be stepped on.
trans-unit.target: 滞留街头既触犯法律，也非明智之举：因为在一处逗留过久容易被踩扁。

trans-unit.target: 附案～如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·31 | Arrester's Admonition | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Law is the voice of reason.
trans-unit.target: 法律是理性之声。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·36 | Coral Commando | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Few Ravnicans are aware of the vast reefs in their world's hidden ocean. Far beneath the great sinkholes, where the light is blue and dim, merfolk tend the coral labyrinths that feed the benthic ecosystem.
trans-unit.target: 几乎没有拉尼卡人知道，这个世界的隐密汪洋之还遍布有广阔暗礁。海底深处仅得泛蓝微光，人鱼在此悉心照料盘曲交错的珊瑚丛，进而维系整个赖此为生的深洋生态。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·58 | Verity Circle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物成为横置时，若它并非于将其宣告为攻击者时而如此，则你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·58 | Verity Circle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
trans-unit.target: {4}{U}：横置目标不具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·58 | Verity Circle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here, there is only truth."\n—Barvisa, Azorius emissary
trans-unit.target: 「进去，里面只有真相。」\n～俄佐立密使巴维莎

trans-unit.resname: RNA·59 | Wall of Lost Thoughts | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wall of Lost Thoughts
trans-unit.target: 忘念墙

trans-unit.resname: RNA·59 | Wall of Lost Thoughts | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender
trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.resname: RNA·59 | Wall of Lost Thoughts | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标牌手将其牌库顶的四张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·59 | Wall of Lost Thoughts | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who intrude upon the Dimir seldom remember that they have done so.
trans-unit.target: 曾擅闯底密尔地盘的人，没几个还记得自己曾做过这事。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·60 | Windstorm Drake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Windstorm Drake
trans-unit.target: 疾风龙兽

trans-unit.resname: RNA·60 | Windstorm Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RNA·60 | Windstorm Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且具飞行异能的其他生物得+1/+0。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·60 | Windstorm Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Drakes become especially voracious as they prepare for their autumn migration, hunting the city's thoroughfares from dawn to dusk.
trans-unit.target: 龙兽在为秋季迁徙作储备时，食欲会变得非常旺盛，从早到晚都能见到它们飞翔在街道上空攻击行人。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·61 | Awaken the Erstwhile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Awaken the Erstwhile
trans-unit.target: 唤醒故军

trans-unit.resname: RNA·61 | Awaken the Erstwhile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各弃掉其手牌，然后派出等量的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·61 | Awaken the Erstwhile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In preparation for the conflict all foresaw, the Golgari called upon an army that had slept for millennia beneath the city.
trans-unit.target: 为备战迫在眉睫的冲突，葛加理唤醒了已在城市地底长眠数千年之久的军队。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·62 | Bankrupt in Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bankrupt in Blood
trans-unit.target: 负债血偿

trans-unit.resname: RNA·62 | Bankrupt in Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲两个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·62 | Bankrupt in Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·62 | Bankrupt in Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your spirits can rest in peace, for your debts are paid."
trans-unit.target: 「你的负债尽数付讫，你的灵魂现可安息。」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·63 | Blade Juggler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blade Juggler
trans-unit.target: 耍刀客

trans-unit.resname: RNA·63 | Blade Juggler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 揭幕{2}{B}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·63 | Blade Juggler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它对你造成1点伤害且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·64 | Bladebrand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bladebrand
trans-unit.target: 炙烤剑尖

trans-unit.resname: RNA·64 | Bladebrand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·64 | Bladebrand | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·64 | Bladebrand | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance."\n—Judith
trans-unit.target: 「在表演的快感之下， 炙热铁器和尖锐利刃带来的痛楚显得苍白无力。」\n～裘蒂丝

trans-unit.resname: RNA·65 | Bloodmist Infiltrator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodmist Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 血雾渗透者

trans-unit.resname: RNA·65 | Bloodmist Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, CARDNAME can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。若你如此作，则CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·65 | Bloodmist Infiltrator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Blood seeks blood, and nothing shall hold back its hunger.
trans-unit.target: 血觅血而行，任万物都压抑不住它的饥渴。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·66 | Carrion Imp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carrion Imp
trans-unit.target: 腐肉小恶魔

trans-unit.resname: RNA·66 | Carrion Imp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RNA·66 | Carrion Imp | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·66 | Carrion Imp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No scrap of nutrition goes to waste in the undercity.
trans-unit.target: 地底城里的营养分毫都不会被浪费。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·67 | Catacomb Crocodile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Catacomb Crocodile
trans-unit.target: 陵墓鳄鱼

trans-unit.resname: RNA·67 | Catacomb Crocodile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel."\n"No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."\nThen Croc came and ate them both.
trans-unit.target:
「我是下水道之王！」老鼠说道。「我又快又精，每条隧道都一清二楚。」
「我才是下水道之王！」灵俑说道。「我又酷又强，潮湿腐败都伤不了我。
」
然后鳄鱼出现，一口吃掉他俩。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·68 | Clear the Stage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Clear the Stage
trans-unit.target: 清空舞台

trans-unit.resname: RNA·68 | Clear the Stage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则你可以将至多一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·68 | Clear the Stage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"
trans-unit.target: 「都让让！最后一幕即将上演！」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·69 | Consign to the Pit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consign to the Pit
trans-unit.target: 坠入深渊

trans-unit.resname: RNA·69 | Consign to the Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·69 | Consign to the Pit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: First your whole life flashes before your eyes. Then you have considerable time to reflect on every regret as you plummet.
trans-unit.target: 一开始，你的眼前会浮现此生往事。随后，你有足够的时间在下坠过程中反思每一丝悔恨。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·70 | Cry of the Carnarium | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cry of the Carnarium
trans-unit.target: 剜祭场呼喊

trans-unit.resname: RNA·70 | Cry of the Carnarium | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。放逐所有坟墓场中的所有于本回合中从战场进入该处之生物牌。如果本回合中有生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·70 | Cry of the Carnarium | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.
trans-unit.target: 如果耳朵流血，这是场普通派对。如果眼睛流血，这是场拉铎司派对。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·71 | Dead Revels | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dead Revels
trans-unit.target: 亡者狂欢

trans-unit.resname: RNA·71 | Dead Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 揭幕{1}{B}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·71 | Dead Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·71 | Dead Revels | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You're only as dead as you feel.
trans-unit.target: 等到自己觉得没劲的时候，才是真的死了。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·72 | Debtors' Transport | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Debtors' Transport
trans-unit.target: 负债者驮兽

trans-unit.resname: RNA·72 | Debtors' Transport | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 往生2（当此生物死去时，派出两个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·72 | Debtors' Transport | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.
trans-unit.target: 石椁设计上就只是为了盖过负债者的呻吟声，而不是将其彻底消除。

trans-unit.source: Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

trans-unit.resname: RNA·73 | Drill Bit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Never boring.
trans-unit.target: 绝无冷场。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·74 | Font of Agonies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Font of Agonies
trans-unit.target: 苦痛洗礼盘

trans-unit.resname: RNA·74 | Font of Agonies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you pay life, put that many blood counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你支付生命时，在CARDNAME上放置等量的鲜血指示物。

trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，从CARDNAME上移去四个鲜血指示物：消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·74 | Font of Agonies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No worthwhile reward is easily gained."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「珍贵回报绝无可能唾手而得。」\n～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.resname: RNA·75 | Grotesque Demise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grotesque Demise
trans-unit.target: 怪诞夺命

trans-unit.resname: RNA·75 | Grotesque Demise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标力量等于或小于3的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·75 | Grotesque Demise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans."\n—Ubea, Orzhov ministrant
trans-unit.target: 「负债者的灵魂毫无价值，不过倒是可以拿来以儆效尤，吓唬那些想要赖帐的人。」\n～欧佐夫主礼人尤蓓

trans-unit.resname: RNA·76 | Gutterbones | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gutterbones
trans-unit.target: 水沟骷髅妖

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·76 | Gutterbones | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你的手上。只能在你的回合中起动此异能，且只有于本回合中有对手曾失去生命时才能起动。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·76 | Gutterbones | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Down here, things don't stay dead."\n—Lavinia
trans-unit.target: 「在这底下，死掉的东西可不安分。」\n～拉温妮

trans-unit.resname: RNA·77 | Ill-Gotten Inheritance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
trans-unit.target: 不当遗产

trans-unit.resname: RNA·77 | Ill-Gotten Inheritance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·77 | Ill-Gotten Inheritance | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {5}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: {5}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：它向目标对手造成4点伤害且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·77 | Ill-Gotten Inheritance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The suffering of others is not my concern."
trans-unit.target: 「别人是否受罪与我无关。」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·78 | Noxious Groodion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Noxious Groodion

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: RNA·78 | Noxious Groodion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Behold the groodion! Ichor-slurper, oozing fiend. Foulest wonder underground. Grandest vermin of them all!"\n—Zalin the Gutter Bard
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧这头古汀兽！吞吐脓水的恶鬼。地底城最污劣的奇观。世间最毒的病媒！」\n～贫窟吟游诗人翟林

trans-unit.resname: RNA·79 | Orzhov Enforcer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orzhov Enforcer
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫执法者

trans-unit.resname: RNA·79 | Orzhov Enforcer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: RNA·79 | Orzhov Enforcer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 往生1（当此生物死去时，派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·79 | Orzhov Enforcer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."
trans-unit.target: 「欠下的债都得还，用钱用命都可以。」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·80 | Orzhov Racketeers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orzhov Racketeers
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫敲诈人

trans-unit.resname: RNA·80 | Orzhov Racketeers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·80 | Orzhov Racketeers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 往生2（当此生物死去时，派出两个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·80 | Orzhov Racketeers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Looks like you need protection."
trans-unit.target: 「你看来需要有人保护。」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·81 | Pestilent Spirit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pestilent Spirit
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫精怪

trans-unit.resname: RNA·81 | Pestilent Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 威慑，死触

trans-unit.resname: RNA·81 | Pestilent Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的瞬间与法术咒语具有死触异能。（它们对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·81 | Pestilent Spirit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its stench corrodes steel. Its miasma sickens angels. Its finality ends hope.
trans-unit.target: 腐败恶臭能让钢铁锈蚀。弥漫瘴气能令天使染疾。绝命之势将希望终结。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·82 | Plague Wight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plague Wight
trans-unit.target: 疫病老妖

trans-unit.resname: RNA·82 | Plague Wight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, each creature blocking it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，每个阻挡它的生物各得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·82 | Plague Wight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For some goods, the best couriers are the dead.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些货物而言，最合适的搬运工就是亡者。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·83 | Priest of Forgotten Gods | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priest of Forgotten Gods
trans-unit.target: 弃神僧侣

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Any number of target players each lose 2 life and sacrifice a creature. You add {B}{B} and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲两个其他生物：任意数量的目标牌手各失去2点生命且牺牲一个生物。你加{B}{B}且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·83 | Priest of Forgotten Gods | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Orzhov are not the only religious tradition on Ravnica, nor the oldest.
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫既不是拉尼卡唯一的宗教教派，也不算最古老的一个。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·84 | Rakdos Trumpeter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos Trumpeter
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司号手

trans-unit.resname: RNA·84 | Rakdos Trumpeter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·84 | Rakdos Trumpeter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{R}: CARDNAME gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}：CARDNAME得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·84 | Rakdos Trumpeter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The louder their performance, the quieter we become in comparison. They are the perfect distractions, for only fools ignore the Rakdos."\n—Lazav
trans-unit.target: 「他们的演出越是吵闹，我们就会显得越安静。他们是最完美的幌子，只有傻子才会忽视拉铎司。」\n～拉札夫

trans-unit.resname: RNA·85 | Spawn of Mayhem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spawn of Mayhem
trans-unit.target: 破坏魔后裔

trans-unit.resname: RNA·85 | Spawn of Mayhem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spectacle {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 揭幕{1}{B}{B}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: RNA·85 | Spawn of Mayhem | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each player. Then if you have 10 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME对每位牌手各造成1点伤害。然后如果你的总生命为10或更少，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·86 | Spire Mangler | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: RNA·86 | Spire Mangler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RNA·86 | Spire Mangler | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature with flying you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标由你操控且具飞行异能的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·86 | Spire Mangler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its mandibles can leave a rider in the clouds astride a headless griffin.
trans-unit.target: 它的利颚能让云中骑手座下的狮鹫突然没了脑袋。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·87 | Thirsting Shade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thirsting Shade
trans-unit.target: 饥渴阴魂

trans-unit.resname: RNA·87 | Thirsting Shade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lifelink
trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: RNA·87 | Thirsting Shade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·87 | Thirsting Shade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your life is a blinding light, your breath a gale, your pulse a deafening drum. Be still. Be still."\n—Dahlya Trul, "Irbitov Lament"
trans-unit.target: 「你的生命似耀眼明光，你的呼吸同强风来袭，你的脉动如震耳鼓声。安息吧。安息吧。」\n～达娅楚尔，《依毕托夫挽歌》

trans-unit.resname: RNA·88 | Undercity Scavenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Undercity Scavenger
trans-unit.target: 地底城拾荒者

trans-unit.resname: RNA·88 | Undercity Scavenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME, then scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物，然后占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·88 | Undercity Scavenger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We grow strong by feasting on failure."\n—Izoni
trans-unit.target: 「我们以失败为食，逐渐壮大。」\n～依佐妮

trans-unit.resname: RNA·89 | Undercity's Embrace | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 地底城之拥

trans-unit.resname: RNA·89 | Undercity's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手牺牲一个生物。如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·89 | Undercity's Embrace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The undercity is always hungry.
trans-unit.target: 地底城永无餍足之时。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·90 | Vindictive Vampire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vindictive Vampire
trans-unit.target: 怀恨吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: RNA·90 | Vindictive Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·90 | Vindictive Vampire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.
trans-unit.target: 理论上，十会盟能管住公会世仇不致一发而不可收。但私人宿怨就管不到了。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·91 | Act of Treason | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 叛行

trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·91 | Act of Treason | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.
trans-unit.target: 在拉铎司人眼中看来，残酷背叛不过是一场特技表演。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·92 | Amplifire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amplifire
trans-unit.target: 倍火妖

trans-unit.resname: RNA·92 | Amplifire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Until your next turn, CARDNAME's base power becomes twice that card's power and its base toughness becomes twice that card's toughness. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到你展示出一张生物牌为止。直到你的下一个回合，CARDNAME的基础力量成为该牌力量的两倍，且其基础防御力成为该牌防御力的两倍。将所展示的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·93 | Burn Bright | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burn Bright
trans-unit.target: 怒火冲天

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·93 | Burn Bright | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."\n—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
trans-unit.target: 「古鲁人血液中的怒火，从先人在创世之初升起第一簇盛大篝火起就开始燃烧，一直延续至今。这股怒火同样也在你的体内燃烧。」\n～古鲁祭师克许卡

trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫教堂那过于浮夸的壮丽装潢，仿佛就想让人把它尽数砸烂。

trans-unit.target: 灾祸行进

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且力量等于或小于1的生物攻击时，CARDNAME对其所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·95 | Cavalcade of Calamity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Let the Dimir worry about witnesses. For the Rakdos, screams count as applause.

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它向每位对手各造成1点伤害并向由对手操控的每个生物各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·97 | Dagger Caster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Keep coming. I have knives enough for everyone."

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。你可以从你手上施放一张总法术力费用等于或小于X的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·99 | Electrodominance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."
trans-unit.target: 「基本上，我们只是把几束小闪电揉在一起变成一束大闪电。」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·100 | Feral Maaka | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 野性玛卡兽

trans-unit.resname: RNA·100 | Feral Maaka | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Lost are the lush meadows and verdant forests, where maaka prowled and lammasu soared. Lost are the wilds, where our hearts were free."\n—Daiva, Gruul storyteller
trans-unit.target: 「昔时曾有茂密草地与葱郁森林，随处可见玛卡兽潜伏其间、拉玛苏翱翔天空，如今一切不复存。昔时曾有不驯荒野，寄托吾人奔放心胸，如今一切不复存。」\n～古鲁说书人戴娃

trans-unit.resname: RNA·101 | Flames of the Raze-Boar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Then CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each other creature that player controls if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME向目标由对手操控的生物造成4点伤害。然后如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则CARDNAME对每个由该牌手操控的其他生物各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·101 | Flames of the Raze-Boar | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「烈火包治百病。」

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物各造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的门数量。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·102 | Gates Ablaze | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.
trans-unit.target: 当伊捷将创新精神拓展到城市的基础建设上后，有时会收获爆炸性的结果。

trans-unit.target: 「今天瓦砾区的占地又扩大了。干得不错。」

trans-unit.resname: RNA·104 | Goblin Gathering | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Two's a party. Three's a felony.

trans-unit.source: {3}{G}: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}{G}：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·105 | Gravel-Hide Goblin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No peace accord will save Ravnica. You don't build on rot. You burn it down and start again."\n—Domri Rade
trans-unit.target: 「和平条约救不了拉尼卡。你不能在腐败根基上做修补。你只能全部烧掉然后重头再来。」\n～多密雷德

trans-unit.source: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 揭幕{R}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.source: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

trans-unit.target: 镜像行进

trans-unit.resname: RNA·108 | Mirror March | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, flip a coin until you lose a flip. For each flip you won, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，掷硬币直到你猜错任一掷为止。你每猜对一掷，便派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物之复制品。这些衍生物获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它们放逐。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·109 | Rix Maadi Reveler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rix Maadi Reveler

trans-unit.resname: RNA·109 | Rix Maadi Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 揭幕{2}{B}{R}（如果本回合有对手曾失去生命，则你可以支付此咒语的揭幕费用而非法术力费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.resname: RNA·109 | Rix Maadi Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: RNA·110 | Rubble Reading | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rubble Reading

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地。占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·110 | Rubble Reading | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Gruul oracles see omens in all forms of destruction: the entrails of a maaka's prey, the flight of vultures over a battlefield, the scattering of toppled stone.
trans-unit.target: 古鲁的先知能从各式各样的破坏之中见得预兆：无论是玛卡兽猎物的内脏、战场上空秃鹫的踪迹，还是倾颓建物的碎石。

trans-unit.resname: RNA·111 | Rubblebelt Recluse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加入公会，哪怕是加入古鲁，都意味着要放弃部分独立自由。他宁愿由着性子去破坏。

trans-unit.source: Rumbling Ruin

trans-unit.resname: RNA·112 | Rumbling Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, count the number of +1/+1 counters on creatures you control. Creatures your opponents control with power less than or equal to that number can't block this turn.
